A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a mess. The argument that Star Wars fans are never happy (not happy cause JJ played it safe & not happy cause RJ took chances) is illogical. JJ has a 89% fan approval & TLJ is substantially lower. Three things (spoilers): 1) Luke milks an alien then drinks milk in awkward scene 2) Leia Flys in space like Marry Poppins (laughable) 3) casino story with CGI slap stick reminiscent of Jar Jar getting lips zapped by pod racer engine lighting.
